TopicTitle: Cant load new versions of mod via CKAN

Articles.Content:
It says I need the ksp version of 1.12.9 yet the latest version steam has is 1.12.2 how do I fix this?

Edited October 1, 2021 by Starslinger999

That's probably not what it says. Many mods support a range of game versions and use something like 1.12.99 as the maximum version to include all future updates, which CKAN sometimes abbreviates to 1.12.9.
